Name: Halberd
Description: Axe head on a long pole.

Name: Full Plate
Effect: Immunity to Critical Hit extra damage.

Name: Duelist Leathers
Effect: Stand up from Prone as a Free Action.

Name: Shadow Leathers
Effect: Advantage on Stealth in Dim Light.

Name: Troll Hide
Effect: Regenerate 1 HP per hour out of combat.

Name: Compound Bow
Effect: Add Strength Mod to Damage rolls.

Name: Cane Sword
Effect: Enemy is Surprised on first round of combat.

Effect: Returns to hand on a miss.

Name: Quarterstaff
Effect: weighted hits adjacent person on crit

Name: Hand Cannon
Effect: Knocks target Prone on Critical Hit.

Effect: advantage if use charm in a clash

Name: Spiked Plate
Effect: Deal 1d4 damage to anyone grappling you.

Name: Mirror Shield

Description: Shield with built-in lamp and spikes.
